QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_subfldmappings.id odf_pk, int_subfldmappings.code as code, int_subfldmappings.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_subfldmappings.clarity_data_type as clarity_data_type, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_subfldmappings.external_data_type as external_data_type, int_subfldmappings.sync_option as sync_option, int_subfldmappings.so_id as so_id, int_subfldmappings.name as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_subfldmappings.external_field as external_field, INT_SUBFLDMAPPINGS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_subfield_map.partition_code as partition_code, INT_SUBFLDMAPPINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_subfldmappings.extended_data_type as extended_data_type, int_subfldmappings.direction as direction, int_subfldmappings.clarity_field as clarity_field, so_id.im_id as odf_grand_parent_id from int_subfldmappings int_subfldmappings JOIN int_subobjmappings int_subobjmappings ON int_subobjmappings.id=int_subfldmappings.so_id JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=int_subfldmappings.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=int_subfldmappings.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_int_subfield_map odf_ca_int_subfield_map ON odf_ca_int_subfield_map.id=int_subfldmappings.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_subobjmappings.id odf_pk, int_subobjmappings.im_id as im_id from int_subobjmappings int_subobjmappings where 1 = 1 ) so_id ON so_id.odf_pk=int_subfldmappings.so_id where 1 = 1
